sentences.en: Generally, there are different third parties intervention : mediator, facilitator, arbitrator and rules manipulator.

sentences.en: Good presentation skills, having capacity to facilitate and deliver program; Experience of facilitator is a plus.

sentences.en: Instead, China is a constructive partner and active facilitator.

sentences.en: The facilitator asks the brainstorming group for their ideas.

sentences.en: The facilitator thanks all participants and gives each a token of appreciation.
sentences.cn: 主持人对所有与会者表示感谢并依次给予赞赏.
